Class R_StockRW

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
ci553.ministore.remote.R_StockRW
All Implemented Interfaces:
RemoteStockR_I, RemoteStockRW_I, Serializable, Remote
public class R_StockRW extends UnicastRemoteObject implements RemoteStockRW_I
Remote implementation of the StockReadWriter interface. Provides remote access to stock read/write operations using RMI. Delegates actual data operations to the StockRW class. This class handles the RMI setup and delegates the method calls to the StockRW instance which interacts with the database.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • R_StockRW

      public R_StockRW(String url) throws RemoteException, StockException
      Constructs a new R_StockRW instance. Initializes the local StockRW instance.
      Parameters:
      url - The database URL (not used in this implementation)
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is an RMI error
      StockException - If there is an error initializing the StockRW instance

    • exists

      public boolean exists(String pNum) throws RemoteException, StockException
      Checks if a product exists in the database. Delegates the call to the local StockRW instance.
      Specified by:
      exists in interface RemoteStockR_I
      Parameters:
      pNum - The product number to check
      Returns:
      true if the product exists, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is an RMI error
      StockException - If there is an error accessing the database

    • buyStock

      public boolean buyStock(String pNum, int amount) throws RemoteException, StockException
      Buys stock by decrementing available quantity. Delegates the call to the local StockRW instance.
      Specified by:
      buyStock in interface RemoteStockRW_I
      Parameters:
      pNum - The product number to purchase
      amount - The quantity to buy
      Returns:
      true if the purchase is successful, false if insufficient stock

      RemoteException - If there is an RMI error
      StockException - If there is an error accessing the database
